1.title: Kazden's First Blacktail
1.plot: THE HUNT takes you around the world in search of thrilling big game adventures. Come along in pursuit of some of the world's most sought-after big game. Whether you hunt with rifle or bow, this series will not only teach you skills, it will make you want to get out and experience what hunting is all about. In this episode Scott Haugen travels to Redding, CA for blacktail deer.

2.title: Bowhunting Montana Elk

Be it with rifle or bow, this series will not only teach you skills, it will make you want to get out and experience what hunting is all about. In this episode, Scott Haugen hunts little belt elk in Montana.

imdb.title: The Hunt
plot: Host Scott Haugen takes viewers on an adventure across the globe in this exciting educational series devoted to all aspects of big-game hunting.
